original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 36
overview: The 36th installment of a popular series that carefully selects and introduces horror videos that have been posted!! "Industrial Park" The contributor, who enjoyed the boasted functional beauty of the industrial park, recorded it with a camera. If you look inside, you'll see a figure that looks like a security guard. Looking closely, it was an eerie existence that was too far from the guards.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 36
